downloadTitle: Planning and Deploying SharePoint Server 2010 User Profiles for My Site Web Sites
downloadDescription: Prescriptive guidance about profile synchronization and My Site planning and administrative tasks for SharePoint Server 2010.
detailsSection: This whitepaper provides prescriptive guidance about profile synchronization and My Site planning and administrative tasks for SharePoint Server 2010. The whitepaper uses a combination of real-world scenarios, step-by-step instruction, and screen shots.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Office Word 2007 or Microsoft Word 2010
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button above to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
